豿字的基本解释

豿
gǒu
古同“狗”。

豿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǒu］
［《廣韻》古厚切，上厚，見。］
同“狗1”。
熊虎幼子名。

豿字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豸字部】　豿； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1200第16
【廣韻】古厚切，音苟。熊虎之子。【爾雅·釋獸】熊虎醜，其子狗。【釋文】狗，本或作豿。　又【集韻】舉厚切，音竘。又許?切，音詬。本作?。義?同。　又【廣韻】許角切，音翯。豕聲。

豿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
豿字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
豿
gǒu
Gu Tong "dog".
豿
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gǒu］
["Guangyun" ancient thick cut, upper thick, see you. ]
Same as "Dog 1".
The name of the young bear.
豿
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【The Department of Bin Characters】　豿; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1200 No. 16
[Guangyun] Ancient thick cut, sound gou. The son of a bear and tiger. 【Erya·Shi Beast】Bear, tiger and ugly, his son is a dog. 【Explanation】Dog, this or as a tiger.　[Jiyun] again thick cut, sound 竘. Xu? Cut, the sound criticized. This work?. Righteous? Same.　[Guang Yun] Xu Jiaoqie, Yinzhu. Hog.
